subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Messages this morning?

 An interesting site Fiona, I asked Tech David about it, he says,=C2=A0 the=
 little ball turns white when Prayers are spoken, and the Lord's Prayer wil=
l turn it white, David says they have the chart in reverse, that all the re=
d is negative or war like thought, yellowish orange is the change from peac=
e and love to more aggressive war like thoughts, and green and blue, whites=
 are the higher more spiritual thought in the world.=C2=A0 Pretty interesti=
ng site, he does not like the sound though, says, it's better to play music=
, he says that the "OM" brings on negaive, I know, it's the "om" but he say=
s it insights negativity, which can induce war to happen. sf

 



-----Ori=
ginal Message-----
From: Fiona Broome <email@...>
To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thu, Sep 30, 2010 10:12 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Me=
ssages this morning?

          =C2=A0                                  Hi,=

 
 I'm interested in very recent EVP-ITC messages... what people have hear=
d on boxes, etc.  
 
 This morning, there's an unusual display of RNG anoma=
lies at the GCP (Global Consciousness Project) site: http://gcpdot.com/
 
 =
If you read this too late to see it, I've posted a screenshot and some blat=
her about possible connections, at http://extreme.hollowhill.com/global-con=
sciousness-dot-blip
 
 At this point, it's a stretch to connect the dot ano=
malies with anything else.  I just figured I'd mention it, in case anyone l=
ooks at the data and has an "ah-HA!" thought.
 
 Cheerfully,
 Fiona
 
 
   =
   
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CD2ECCC12185A5_1B34_72A_webmail-d019.sysops.aol.com

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> An inte=

le ball turns white when Prayers are spoken, and the Lord's Prayer will tur=
n it white, </b>David says <b>they have the chart in reverse</b>, that all =
the red is negative or war like thought, yellowish orange is the change fro=
m peace and love to more aggressive war like thoughts, and green and blue, =
whites are the higher more spiritual thought in the world.  Pretty int=
eresting site, he does not like the sound though, says, it's better to play=
 music, he says that the "OM" brings on negaive, I know, it's the "om" but =
he says it insights negativity, which can induce war to happen. sf<br>

 Fiona<br>
